list_definition.definition: (the door or cover of) an opening in a wall, floor, ship’s deck etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There are two hatches between the kitchen and dining-room for serving food.

list_definition.definition: to produce (young birds etc) from eggs

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: My hens have hatched ten chicks.

list_definition.definition: to break out of the egg

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Four of the eggs have hatched.

list_definition.definition: to plan (something, usually bad) in secret

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They hatched a plot to kidnap a rich businessman.
